amendment.description: Amendment sought to condition new air service at four major airports on the Secretary's approval of a new airport noise reduction program that would include local public input.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 6 and printed in H. Rept. 106-185 to condition new service at Reagan National, JFK, LaGuardia, and O'Hare airports on the Department of Transportation approval of an airport noise reduction program that includes local public input and can include restrictions on aircraft originally built for stage II compliance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moran (VA) amendment (A006) Failed by voice vote.
